testcase.name: junit5.ta

error.message: The resource SCOPE_BUILTIN:actual_file cannot be found. Please note that the resource name must not contains any space.

testcase.error:
Summary SETUP : // here we test the macro defined in shortcuts/sample_shortcut.macro. Note that none of the instructions here are case sensitive : TEST : [SUCCESS] # EXECUTE_JUNIT_TEST randomTest() FROM singe.banana.RandomTestJUnit5 IN selenium-resources/src/test [SUCCESS] LOAD selenium-resources/src/test AS junit50.file [SUCCESS] CONVERT junit50.file TO script.java(compile) AS junit50.bundle [SUCCESS] CONVERT junit50.bundle TO script.junit5(structured) AS junit50.script [SUCCESS] EXECUTE execute WITH junit50.script AS junit51.result USING $(qualifiedClassName:singe.banana.RandomTestJUnit5,displayName:randomTest()) [SUCCESS] $(qualifiedClassName:singe.banana.RandomTestJUnit5,displayName:randomTest()) --> {{__tempI1}} [SUCCESS] EXECUTE execute WITH junit50.script AS junit51.result USING {{__tempI1}} [SUCCESS] ASSERT junit51.result IS success [ERROR] # ASSERT_XML {actual_file} SIMILAIRE TO {expected_file_path} USING {config} // (Copyright (C) 2014, DSI - AcadÃ©mie d'OrlÃ©ans-Tours // Modified by Henix (C) 2016-2018 [ERROR] LOAD {actual_file} AS __actual_2.file org.squashtest.ta.backbone.exception.ResourceNotFoundException: The resource SCOPE_BUILTIN:actual_file cannot be found.
